usher.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to help someone to get from one place to another, especially by showing them the way
usher.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He ushered her into the room.
She stood back and ushered him in.
usher.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: someone who shows people to their seats at a theatre, cinema, wedding etc
usher.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: someone who works in a law court whose job is to guide people in and out of the courtrooms
